section.name: Changes
section.p: Below are the changes starting with version 1.2

ul.li:
XQuerySearch fix to not return a VOResources root element
Fix to support queries with 0 results. Current bug in 1.1 threw an exception.
Added WebDav support.
Added backup, restore, and client scripts
Added different logging mechanism.
No longer debugs so much logging.
RPC access. (main use though is for client scripts.)
Uses contracts component for access to schemas and wsdls along with validation.
Build up for multiple contracts and preparation to support paging.
